resources.string: Safe
Input data seems to be corrupt.
This is a very secret message ಠᴗಠ
You have not created a key yet.
You have removed the screen lock and the key got permanently invalidated.\nGo to \'Settings -> Security -> Screenlock\' to set up a lock screen
Secure lock screen hasn\'t set up.\nGo to \'Settings -> Security -> Screenlock\' to set up a lock screen
1. Create a key
Create a symmetric key which is stored inside the KeyStore and which will be used for encryption / decryption.
No user authentication required
User needs to be authenticated during the last 15 seconds
User needs to authenticate every time via fingerprint
✓ Key successfully created!
Create key
2. Encrypt a message
Enter a text you would like to encrypt / decrypt:
Encrypt
Decrypt
Hey there!
Please authenticate in order to access the securely stored key material. Thanks!
Authenticate
Authentication failed.
Authentication successful!
Bad news:\nYour device does not have a supported fingerprint reader :-(
Whoa - not so fast! You haven\'t enrolled any fingerprints yet.\nGo to \'Settings -> Security -> Nexus Imprint\' to enroll at least one finger
